commandNotFoundDescription: How dare you asking me about it?!
internalErrorMessage: {{- author}} is trying to kill me! Help me please {{developers}}
internalErrorDescription: Are you trying to destabilize me?

poll.description: Create 'yes/no' poll. React with üëç for yes, and üëé for no.

alias.description: Add or remove alias for command. To see aliases for command type just command.

debug.description: Add/remove user as a developer to receive debug notifications.

man.description: Shows manual for commands (without arg shows full list).

prefix.description: Change prefix for bot's commands. 'reset' restores default value
prefix.changedDescription: Now I'll answer you if you start you message with '{{prefix}}'

wtf.messageDescription: I'm The Executor and I'm here to rule!
